content:
FYI: https://www.healthaide.com.au/blog/how-grahame-grieve-is-changing-the-way-your-health-data-is-managed

No copyright on this, so reuse / quotation / reshaping is all good if it's useful for anyone
(well, there's a copyright on the blog parts, but not the core, which I wrote)
That link gave me a 404, but this one with numbers seems to work: https://www.healthaide.com.au/blog/how-grahame-grieve-is-changing-the-way-your-health-data-is-managed4218950

Top quote: "Industry colleagues have often branded you as the private and humble Melbournian "Elon Musk of healthcare"."

Right! The giant-ego billionaire who gets stoned on live video podcast! That's our Grahame! :-)

Who the @#$% are these "industry colleagues"?? Is that an Oz thing??

Seriously, for me this is a good text description of what FHIR will do. I'm going to be circulating it to friends and family for reaction.

Do we have any graphics at all that might make similar points at a glance?
"Industry colleagues " is short hand for we want to ask you a poking question to see what happens
Ahh, comparable to Trump asserting "Many people are saying..."
I never caught Grahame smoking or drinking, let alone smoking weed, not even in Amsterdam.
